description.value:
20 foot, @Check[type:fortitude|dc:]{DC equal to the siabrae's spell DC - 4}.

A creature that enters the aura or begins its turn there becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2} on a failure (or sickened 4 on a critical failure). An animal, fey, or plant that rolls a failure gets a critical failure instead. Regardless of the result of the saving throw, the creature is temporarily immune to the siabrae's miasma for 1 minute.
